ORDER BY BO_NO DESC ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT A.BO_NO BONUM, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER, BO_IP, BO_MAIL, BO_PASS, BO_CONTENT, BO_DATE, BO_REP, BO_HIT, BO_REC, BO_PARENT
, ATT_NO, ATT_FILENAME, ATT_SAVENAME , ATT_MIME, ATT_FILESIZE, ATT_FANCYSIZE , ATT_DOWNLOAD FROM FREEBOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTATCH B ON (A.BO_NO = B.BO_NO) WHERE A.BO_NO = #{boNo}
